page.title: 13Allenton Sports Ground,Derby
page.content: Allenton has a patch of land called the Municipal Sports Ground. It has a big all weather running track and a patch of grass in the middle where football teams play. The grass is also used for hammer throwing and for javelin. There is a small stand for spectators. For the past two years Derby has held its own marathon event, called the Ramathon, which starts and finishes at this ground. The ground is used by local athletics clubs. Large sporting events like the national Asian Games are also held here. Our school, Allenton Primary, holds its annual Sports Day on this track. We have flat and relay races for boys and girls, skipping races for the girls only and sack races for the boys only. We also have a "Mums and Dads" race.
